English: And now, the end is near
Portuguese: E agora, o fim está próximo

English: And so I face the final curtain
Portuguese: E então encaro a cortina final

English: My friend, I'll say it clear
Portuguese: Meu amigo, direi claramente

English: I'll state my case, of which I'm certain
Portuguese: Apresentarei meu caso, do qual estou certo

English: I've lived a life that's full
Portuguese: Vivi uma vida plena

English: I traveled each and every highway
Portuguese: Viajando por cada estrada

English: And more, much more than this
Portuguese: E mais, muito mais que isso

English: I did it my way
Portuguese: Fiz do meu jeito

English: Regrets, I've had a few
Portuguese: Arrependimentos, tive alguns

English: But then again, too few to mention
Portuguese: Mas, novamente, tão poucos para mencionar

English: I did what I had to do
Portuguese: Fiz o que tinha que fazer

English: And saw it through without exemption
Portuguese: E levei adiante sem exceção

English: I planned each charted course
Portuguese: Planejei cada rota traçada

English: Each careful step along the byway
Portuguese: Cada passo cuidadoso ao longo do caminho

English: And more, much more than this
Portuguese: E mais, muito mais que isso

English: I did it my way
Portuguese: Fiz do meu jeito

English: Yes, there were times, I'm sure you knew
Portuguese: Sim, houve momentos, tenho certeza que você soube

English: When I bit off more than I could chew
Portuguese: Quando mordi mais do que podia mastigar

English: But through it all, when there was doubt
Portuguese: Mas, apesar de tudo, quando havia dúvida

English: I ate it up and spit it out
Portuguese: Eu engoli e cuspi

English: I faced it all and I stood tall
Portuguese: Encarei tudo e me mantive firme

English: And did it my way
Portuguese: E fiz do meu jeito

English: I've loved, I've laughed and cried
Portuguese: Amei, ri e chorei

English: I've had my fill, my share of losing
Portuguese: Tive minha parte, minha cota de perdas

English: And now, as tears subside
Portuguese: E agora, à medida que as lágrimas cessam

English: I find it all so amusing
Portuguese: Acho tudo isso tão divertido

English: To think I did all that
Portuguese: Pensar que fiz tudo isso

English: And may I say, not in a shy way
Portuguese: E posso dizer, não de maneira tímida

English: Oh no, oh no, not me
Portuguese: Oh não, oh não, não eu

English: I did it my way
Portuguese: Fiz do meu jeito

English: For what is a man, what has he got?
Portuguese: Pois o que é um homem, o que ele tem?

English: If not himself, then he has naught
Portuguese: Se não a si mesmo, então ele não tem nada

English: To say the things he truly feels
Portuguese: Para dizer as coisas que realmente sente

English: And not the words of one who kneels
Portuguese: E não as palavras de quem se ajoelha

English: The record shows I took the blows
Portuguese: Os registros mostram que eu suportei os golpes

English: And did it my way!
Portuguese: E fiz do meu jeito!

English: Yes, it was my way
Portuguese: Sim, foi do meu jeito
